Package index

All functions

assign_cognitive_impairment()
Assign cognitive impairment status using Bezdicek et al.'s (2017) normative calculator
check_compatibility()
Check compatibility between item data and REDCap data
check_names()
Check patient names in hand-written data
check_ranges()
Check value ranges in the prepared dataset
compute_descriptives()
Compute descriptive statistics for selected sample variables
compute_z_score()
Compute z-score(s) based on raw scores and demographic regression model
concords
Table of Pairwise Concordance Measures
data_paths()
Define file paths to raw data for analysis
describe_concordance()
Compute and visualise measures of concordance between diagnostic criteria
diagnose_pdd_case()
Diagnose PDD in a single patient sample using specified criteria
diagnose_pdd_sample()
Diagnose PDD in all patients using all available criteria
do_summary()
Summarise data using predefined summary types
gt_apa_table()
Generate an APA-style table using the gt package
import_item_data()
Import item-data
import_redcap_data()
Import REDCap data
list_algos()
Prepare a list of algorithms stratified by IADL mesure
make_dendrogram()
Make a Dendrogram of PDD Algorithms
prepare_data()
Pre-process data for analysis
regress_pdd_on_demographics()
Regress probable PDD on age and sex across diagnostic criteria
specify_criteria()
Specify criteria operationalisations for PDD diagnosis
summarise_kappa()
Prepare a list of algorithms stratified by IADL mesure
summarise_rates()
Orders and prints algorithms based on their estimated PDD rates
table_criteria()
Generate a summary table of PDD criteria used in the study
table_estimands()
Generate a summary table of study estimands
table_levelII_approximations()
Generate summary table of top and bottom Level I algorithms in predicting Level II-derived probable PDD
